definitions.definition: A person , group , or organization that uses violent action , or the threat of violent action, to further political goals .
An agent or partisan of the revolutionary tribunal during the Reign of Terror in France .

main_definition: A person , group , or organization that uses violent action , or the threat of violent action, to further political goals .
secondary_definitions: ( historical ) An agent or partisan of the revolutionary tribunal during the Reign of Terror in France .
